terms.term: Atmospheric dispersion modeling is the mathematical simulation of how air pollutants disperse in the ambient atmosphere.

Biofilter is a packed media bed made of a substrate like compost, wood bark and other organic and inorganic material which support growth of a biological slime layer to abosrb and remove the pollutants.
Biotrickling filters are packed tower scrubbers wehre pollutants are removed using microbes.
Henry's Law allows to predict the equilibrium concentration of a dissolved coumpound in the air phase.
An organic compound (C8H7N) containing nitrogen that has an ammonia odor.

Level of OC San currently implements specific collection system odor control limits (LOS) for preventing excessive corrosion at collection system pipelines and structures and limiting odor impacts at receptors.
These specific LOS are defined as follows: Daily average of less than or equal to 25 ppm H2S vapor phase in sewer or manhole headspaces Daily average of less than or equal to 0.5 mg/L dissolved sulfides in the liquid phase within sewers A total of 28 or fewer odor complaints annually directly attributable to OC San as defined in the December 2015 Five-Year Strategic Plan (OC San, 2015)
It is the ratio of the number of moles of one component to the total number of moles representing all of the components

The National Fire Protection Association (NFPA) is an international nonprofit organization which establishes standards to eliminate death, injury, property and economic loss due to fire, electrical and related hazards.

Minimum concentration of a substance at which a majority of test subjects can detect and identify the characteristic odor of a substance. It must be noted that olfactory perception varies among individuals.

Oxidation Reduction Potential. It is a measure of a substances ability to either oxidize or reduce another substance. It is measured by the electrodes of an ORP meter. A positive reading on an ORP meter means that the substance is an oxidizing agent; a negative reading indicates that the substance is a reducing agent.
pH is a measure of relative acidity or basicity of a substance. A pH value of 7 is neutral, pH less than 7 is acifdic and greater than 7 is basic or alkaline.
PM stands for particulate matter which is the term for a mixture of solid particles and liquid droplets found in the air. PM10 are inhalable particles, with diameters 10 micrometers and smaller.

Polar compounds are those with distinct regions of positive and negative charge - NH3 and H2S are polar. In a non-polar compound, the chemical bonds are arranged in such a way that the distribution of charges are symmetrical - most organic molecules are non-polar..
Part per billion by volume. It is a measure of pollutant concentration.

South Coast Air Quality Management District is the regulatory agency responsible for developing and enforcing local air quality related regulations primarily designed to protect public health and prevent public nuisance. The jurisdiction of SCAQMD includes all of Orange County and portions of Los Angeles, Riverside, and San Bernardino counties.

"A person shall not discharge from any source whatsoever such quantities of air contaminants or other material which cause injury, detriment, nuisance, or annoyance to any considerable number of persons or to the public, or which endanger the comfort, repose, health or safety of any such persons or the public, or which cause, or have a natural tendency to cause, injury or damage to business or property."
